word_mean: 遗腹的：父亲死后出生的

sentence.Network_en: He received a posthumous award for bravery.
sentence.Network_cn: 他表现勇敢,死后受到了嘉奖.

sentence.Network_cn: 他的家人和支持者为争取其获得身后赦免而开展了多年的运动。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin postumus 'last' (superlative from post 'after'), in late Latin spelled posth- by association with humus 'ground'

entry.def: Posthumous is used to describe something that happens after a person's death but relates to something they did before they died.

example.ex: His family and supporters have campaigned  for many years for a posthumous pardon.
example.tran: 他的家人和支持者为争取其获得身后赦免而开展了多年的运动。

example.ex: ...the posthumous publication of his first novel.
example.tran: 他的第一部小说在他死后的出版

means.word_mean: 1. occurring or coming into existence after a person's death;

auth_sentence.content: Hardy's reputation has not taken the accustomed posthumous dip.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hardy's reputation has not taken the accustomed posthumous dip.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hardy's reputation has not taken the accustomed posthumous dip.

auth_sentence.content: Posthumous remixes might still open stylistic doors.
auth_sentence.res_content: Posthumous remixes might still open stylistic doors.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Posthumous remixes might still open stylistic doors.

auth_sentence.content: His friend A. F. Wedgwood...had recently died leaving a posthumous novel.
auth_sentence.res_content: His friend A. F. Wedgwood...had recently died leaving a posthumous novel.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His friend A. F. Wedgwood...had recently died leaving a posthumous novel.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"邮件,邮政"; 2. 表示"在后面"

post在后面+er+ior……的→后面的
post在后面+graduate毕业→n.研究所学生,研究生 adj.大学毕业后的
post在后面+hum土+ous……的→入土表示死→死后的
post在后面+war战争→adj.战后的
post邮件,邮政→n.邮件,邮政 v. 邮递
post邮件,邮政+age费用→n.邮资
post邮件,邮政+card纸片→n.明信片
post邮件,邮政+er表示东西→n.招贴画,驿站
post邮件,邮政+man人→n.邮差
post邮件,邮政+mark记号→n.邮戳
post邮件,邮政+office办公室→n.邮局
post在后面+date日期→v. 填迟……的日期 n. 事后日期
post在后面+er+ity表名词→后面的人→子孙
post在后面+face脸;前面→后面的脸→刊后语
post在后面+graduate毕业→n.研究所学生,研究生 adj.大学毕业后的
post在后面+script写→写在后面的话
post邮件,邮政→n.邮件,邮政 v. 邮递
post在后面+date日期→v. 填迟……的日期 n. 事后日期
post在后面+pone放→放到后面→推迟
hum土,地+an表名词和形容词,人→传说中人是土造出来的
human[adj.人的,人类的 n.人]+e→有人情的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 谦卑的,恭顺的;地位低下的
stems_affixes.word_buile: hum土,地+ble→接近地面→低下的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 充满潮湿的, 湿润的, 多湿气的

non非+human人的,人类的→adj.非人类的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 非人类的,无人类属性的

hum土,地+an表名词和形容词,人→传说中人是土造出来的
humid湿润的+ity表名词→n.湿气,湿度
humiliate[v.使羞辱,使丢脸[同]]+ion表名词→n.羞辱, 蒙耻

hum土,地+mock园丘→土丘
ex出+hum土+e→出土→挖出
hum土,地+ble→接近地面→低下的
hum土,地+iliate=ate使……→使接近地面,使低下→使丢脸
in进入+hum土,地+e→进入土中

means.word_mean: 死后发生的;死后获得的
